problem_text_cn: 如图,在同一时刻,测得小华和旗杆的影长分别为1m和6m,小华的身高约为1.6m,则旗杆的高约为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, at the same time, the measured shadow lengths of Xiaohua and the flagpole are N_0 and N_1, respectively. Xiaohua's height is about N_2, and the height of the flagpole is about ()
raw_comment: 熟练掌握相似三角形的性质,能够求解一些简单的线段的长度问题．
